DOC.brief_summary: The aim retrospective study analyze nighttime antimuscarincs may effective treat patient nocturia .
DOC.brief_title: Antimuscarinic Treatment Female Patients With Overactive Bladder Syndrome : Comparison Daytime Nighttime Dosing
DOC.criteria: patient underwent tolterodine SR treatment per day 12 week Department Obstetrics & Gynecology National Taiwan University Hospital Far Eastern Memorial Hospital
